mapper.select: select team.team_number, team.start_date, team.end_time, team.address, team.request, t.serial from (select team_user.team_id, team_user.serial from team_user where team_user.status = 1 and team_user.user_id = #{studentId} and team_user.is_student = #{isStudentId}) as t inner join team on t.team_id = team.id
select class.grade from class where class.status = 1 and class.id = (select student.class_id from student where student.status = 1 and student.id = #{studentId})

select s.id as subjectId,s.subject_name as subjectName,stu.name studentName,stu.student_number as studentNumber,stu.phone_number as studentPhone from subject s, student stu where s.student_id=stu.id and s.student_id in ( select tu.user_id from team_user tu where tu.team_id = #{groupId} and tu.is_student=1) limit #{start},#{size}

select count(*) from ( select s.id,s.subject_name as subjectName,stu.name,stu.student_number as studentNumber,stu.phone_number as phoneNumber from subject s, student stu where s.student_id=stu.id and s.student_id in ( select tu.user_id from team_user tu where tu.team_id = #{groupId} and tu.is_student=1)) as s
